gov.va.med.srcalc.web.controller.admin

Class BaseRuleController

  • java.lang.Object
    • gov.va.med.srcalc.web.controller.admin.BaseRuleController
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    EditRuleController, NewRuleController

    @Controller
public abstract class BaseRuleController
extends java.lang.Object

    Base Web MVC controller for creating or editing rules. Contains common behavior for creating and editing rules.

      • ATTRIBUTE_VARIABLE_SUMMARIES

        protected static final java.lang.String ATTRIBUTE_VARIABLE_SUMMARIES
        The model attribute key of a map from variable key to VariableSummary. Will contain an entry for every variable used by the rule.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • requestRemoveMatcher

        @RequestMapping(method=POST,
                params="removeButton")
public org.springframework.web.servlet.ModelAndView requestRemoveMatcher(@ModelAttribute(value="rule")
                                                                               EditRule editRule,
                                                                               @RequestParam(value="removeButton")
                                                                               int removeIndex)
                                                                  throws InvalidIdentifierException
        Removes the specified ValueMatcher from the form backing object and re-presents the edit rule page.
        Parameters:
        editRule - the form backing object
        removeIndex - the index of the ValueMatcher to remove
        Throws:
        InvalidIdentifierException - if any variable key referenced by the EditRule does not exist
